name: Milk Vita Butter
description:
Unlike other butter brands, milk vita butter has comparatively low calories in it which reduces the risk f getting fat. The nutrients of milk vita butter are very rich because it is made of pure milk and cream. You can use milk vita butter in many of the items. Also can use as breakfast spreading in your bread and feel the taste and creamy texture of the butter.

name: Nucella+ Chocolate Bread Spread Cocoa & Almond
description:
Introducing the indulgent Nucella Fortified Chocolate Spread in Cocoa & Almond flavor, a 230 gm jar of pure delight that blends the richness of cocoa with the crunchiness of almonds. Get ready to experience a symphony of flavors and textures that's both luxurious and nourishing. Unveil a world of decadence as you discover the Nucella Fortified Chocolate Spread. Each spoonful is a masterpiece, combining the velvety cocoa goodness with the delightful crunch of almonds. The harmonious balance between the creamy chocolate and the nutty texture creates a taste sensation that's both satisfying and irresistible.

name: Alfa Mayonnaise
description:
This product is manufactured/packaged in India and its raw materials are collected from the United Arab Emirates. Alfa mayonnaise is a creamy food made with rice fiber oil and vinegar that gives a delicious flavor to your burger, pizza, sandwich, and other snacks. But not suitable for vegetarians. Net weight 236 ml.

name: Nutella Hazelnut Cocoa Spread
description:
Nutella is an inspiring tale of love and passion, combined with careful selection and processing of raw materials, spreading positive energy for families to start optimistically around the world. Nutella® enhances unique hazelnut and cocoa flavor with its unique creaminess. A small amount of this delicacy is enough to guarantee an unparalleled taste experience. Enjoy the delicacy in diverse ways starting from breakfast bread spread, and shakes, to desserts and cakes, or just eat it!

name: Naples Mayonnaise
description:
Naples Mayonnaise is a larger-sized creamy dressing, ideal for use in family meals or gatherings. It has a rich, velvety texture and a balanced flavor, perfect for adding to sandwiches, salads, and more. The 475 ml bottle provides enough quantity for everyday use, making it a kitchen staple. Great for food enthusiasts who love making fresh dishes with a creamy touch.

name: Naples Mayonnaise
description:
Naples Mayonnaise is a smooth and creamy dressing that adds a rich, tangy flavor to your salads, sandwiches, and dips. The 170 ml bottle is perfect for those who enjoy this classic condiment in smaller quantities. Versatile and delicious, it enhances both cold and warm dishes with its well-balanced taste. A must-have for every kitchen to elevate your meals.

name: Nutella Hazelnut Cocoa Spread
description:
Nutella Hazelnut Cocoa Spread 750g is a creamy and delicious spread made from a perfect blend of finely ground hazelnuts, cocoa, and a touch of sweetness. Known for its smooth texture and rich flavor, Nutella is ideal for spreading on bread, pancakes, and waffles, or used in baking and desserts. Ingredients:SugarPalm OilHazelnuts (13%)Cocoa (7.4%)Milk PowderLecithin (Emulsifier)Vanillin (Artificial Flavoring) Benefits:Source of Energy: Packed with carbohydrates and fats for a quick energy boost.Rich in Hazelnuts: Hazelnuts provide healthy fats, antioxidants, and vitamins like vitamin E.Versatile: Perfect for spreading on toast, pancakes, or adding to smoothies and desserts.Tasty Indulgence: Offers a rich, chocolatey taste that is loved by both kids and adults. Nutella Hazelnut Cocoa Spread 750g is a delicious treat for any time of the day, perfect for satisfying your sweet cravings with its unique blend of cocoa and hazelnut.

Ingredients:
Sugar
Palm Oil

Cocoa (7.4%)
Milk Powder
Lecithin (Emulsifier)
Vanillin (Artificial Flavoring)

name: Sundrop Peanut Butter Regular Creamy
description:
Introducing the irresistible indulgence of Sundrop Creamy Peanut Butter, a velvety-smooth spread that captures the essence of rich, roasted peanuts. Encased within a convenient 200 gm jar, this culinary masterpiece brings together the perfect fusion of creaminess and nutty goodness, making it a must-have addition to your kitchen pantry.    Sundrop Creamy Peanut Butter is a masterpiece created from select, high-quality peanuts. Crafted through a meticulous roasting process, the natural oils of the peanuts are coaxed to create a luxuriously smooth and spreadable texture that is ready to elevate your culinary creations.

name: Orgin Peanut Butter Creamy & Crunchy
description:
Crunchy Peanut Butter has a little more fiber and less saturated fat, making it overall more nutritious. Some coarsely-ground peanut fragments are included to give an extra texture that helps maintain bowel health.

name: Farmer's Gold Peanut Butter Creamy
description:
Farmer's Gold Creamy Peanut Butter is more than just a spread; it's a commitment to your taste buds and well-being. Whether you're spreading it on a morning toast, adding it to your smoothie, or using it as a versatile ingredient in your recipes, our peanut butter offers a delicious and nutritious experience. Taste the purity, savor the quality, and make every meal a delightful experience with this velvety peanut butter.

name: Cadbury Cream Spread Caramel
description:
Indulge in the luxurious and irresistible sweetness of Cadbury Cream Spread Caramel, a 400-gram jar of pure caramel bliss that brings the iconic Cadbury flavor to your breakfasts, snacks, and desserts. It is your passport to caramel paradise. Whether you're spreading it on your morning toast, using it as a dip for snacks, or incorporating it into your dessert recipes, this caramel spread adds a touch of luxury to your everyday moments. Savor the indulgent taste of Cadbury Cream Spread Caramel and elevate your sweet creations with the timeless sweetness of caramel.

name: Highway Crunchy Peanut Butter
description:
Highway Crunchy Peanut Butter 510 gm is a delectable and wholesome spread made from premium-quality roasted peanuts. It's known for its rich, nutty flavor and delightful crunch, making it a versatile and delicious addition to your pantry. Whether you enjoy it on toast, in sandwiches, or as an ingredient in various recipes, Highway Crunchy Peanut Butter is a beloved classic for peanut enthusiasts. It's a staple condiment that adds depth and deliciousness to a wide range of dishes, snacks, and treats.

name: Hershey's Caramel Syrup
description:
Hershey's Caramel Syrup is a luscious and indulgent dessert topping that adds a rich, velvety caramel flavor to your favorite treats and desserts. Crafted with the signature quality of Hershey's, this syrup is a beloved choice for drizzling over ice cream, pancakes, waffles, or incorporating into various dessert recipes. With its smooth consistency and unmistakable caramel taste, Hershey's Caramel Syrup is the perfect way to elevate the sweetness of your culinary creations. Packaged in a convenient 623 gm bottle, it ensures that you have an ample supply of caramel goodness for your dessert adventures.

name: Discovery Peanut Butter Smooth & Creamy
description:
Discovery Peanut butter is a food paste or spread made from ground dry roasted peanuts. Discovery peanut butter is delicious and crunchy. Our peanut butter is well known for its authentic peanut taste and interesting varieties. The particularly delicate taste leaves the flavor of foods intact, even the most delicate, either fried or cooked.
